p: (−)-Ledol ( 1) is the only sesquiterpene alcohol present in this EO, counting for more than 21% of the total analysis. Its molecular structure is shown in Supplementary Material. In order to set up the preparative purification method, four fractions of increasing polarity were previously obtained by normal phase preparative thin layer chromatography (TLC), indicated with numbers from 1 to 4. These fractions were analysed under the same conditions as those adopted for the GC-MS analysis of the total oil. From the GC-MS patterns of the resulting fractions, it can be observed that fraction 3 mainly consists of (−)-ledol (see Supplementary Material).
